aws_account_id        = "<your_account_id>"
aws_access_key_id     = "<your_access_key_id>"
aws_secret_access_key = "<your_secret_access_key>"
domain                = "sdp-prod"
ecr_repository                    = "tech-audit-tool-api" # ECR repository name where the lambda image is stored
tech_audit_data_bucket_name       = "sdp-prod-tech-audit-tool-api" # S3 bucket name where the tech audit data is stored
tech_audit_secret_manager_name    = "sdp-prod-tech-audit-tool-api/secrets" # Secrets Manager secret name for tech audit data
aws_cognito_token_url             = "https://tech-audit-tool-api-sdp-prod.auth.eu-west-2.amazoncognito.com/oauth2/token"
